description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It initializes React, sets up icon libraries, and renders the main application component. It imports core React modules, styling, and external icon sets, and mounts the root component to the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for React rendering in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: library.add
methods.description: Adds icon packs to Font Awesome's icon library.
